All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Enum Summary Exception Summary 
    Class Description
    BindingState
    BindingState defines the current state of the vProvisionedTokenId.
    BiometricsSupport
    An enum that identifies if the device is capable of supporting the biometrics or not.
    DeviceAuthentication
    DeviceAuthentication is used for user authentication(Biometric/KeyGuard).
    DeviceAuthenticationChecker
    DeviceAuthenticationChecker used to check what kind of authentication the device supports.
    DeviceAuthenticationMethod
    DeviceAuthenticationMethod defines supported device authentication methods.
    DeviceKeyguardSupport
    An enum that identified if the device is capable of supporting the device keyguard.
    IDVMethod
    IDVMethod defines the IDV method available to the end user
    IDVType
    IDVType defines the supported idv types.
    MastercardIDVMethod
    MastercardIDVMethod defines the Mastercard IDV methods available to the end user.
    MastercardIDVType
    Identity and Verification method types for MastercardIDVType.
    MastercardIssuerAuthenticationListener
    This callback is used to inform the MastercardTAFHelper.triggerIssuerAuthentication(String, String, MastercardIssuerAuthenticationListener) process result.
    MastercardIssuerAuthenticationSession
    MastercardPendingBindingSession is used to get tokenID session details with pending activation.
    MastercardTAFHelper
    MastercardTAFHelper is used to bind and authenticate tokenId with the device.
    OtpActivationStatus
    This object capture the otp activation status during PendingBindingSession.submitIdvMethod(IDVMethod) and send back to applications.
    PendingBindingSession
    PendingBindingSession is used to get vProvisionedTokenId session details with pending activation.
    RemoveBindingListener
    This callback is use to inform the removeBinding(String, String, RemoveBindingListener) process result.
    SyncBindingStateListener
    This callback is use to inform the syncBindingState(String, String, SyncBindingStateListener) process result.
    TMGClient
    TMGClient used to create VisaCTFHelper and MastercardTAFHelper objects which is used to bind and authenticate the vProvisionedTokenId to device for VISA and authenticate the user for mastercard.
    TMGClientConfiguration
    TMGClientConfiguration used to configure the Application Context, Server URl, Server certificate, Device Authentication method, Key identifier and Certificate pins.
    TMGClientConfiguration.Builder
    Used to build TMGClientConfiguration object
    TMGClientException
    TMGClientException is generic exception class to handle all TMG SDK errors.
    TokenBindingListener
    This callback is use to inform the createBinding(String, String, String, TokenBindingListener) process result.
    TransactionListener
    This callback is use to inform the authenticateTransaction(String, TransactionListener) process result.
    VisaCTFHelper
    VisaCTFHelper is used to bind and authenticate vProvisionedTokenId with the device.
